Members.Name: errorLanguage
Members.Description:
This should be the standard RFC 3066
								language identification tag, e.g.,
								en_US.

Members.Name: detailLevel
Members.Description:
This specifies the required detail level
								that is needed by a client application
								pertaining to a particular data
								component (e.g., Item, Transaction,
								etc.). The detail level is specified in
								the DetailLevelCodeType which has all
								the enumerated values of the detail
								level for each component.

Members.Name: invoice
Members.Description: Data to populate the newly created invoice.

Members.Name: merchantEmail
Members.Description: Merchant's email.

Members.Name: payerEmail
Members.Description: Email to which the invoice will be sent.

Members.Name: currencyCode
Members.Description: Currency used for all invoice item amounts and totals.

Members.Name: paymentTerms
Members.Description: Terms by which the invoice payment is due.

Members.Name: itemList
Members.Description: List of items included in this invoice.

Members.Name: name
Members.Description: SKU or item name.

Members.Name: quantity
Members.Description: Item count.

Members.Name: unitPrice
Members.Description: Price of the item, in the currency specified by the invoice.

Members.Name: description
Members.Description: Description of the item.

Members.Name: date
Members.Description: Date on which the product or service was provided.

Members.Name: taxName
Members.Description: Name of an applicable tax, if any.

Members.Name: taxRate
Members.Description: Rate of an applicable tax, if any.

Members.Name: number
Members.Description: Unique identifier for the invoice.

Members.Name: invoiceDate
Members.Description: Date on which the invoice will be enabled.

Members.Name: dueDate
Members.Description: Date on which the invoice payment is due.

Members.Name: discountPercent
Members.Description: A discount percent applied to the invoice, if any.

Members.Name: discountAmount
Members.Description: A discount amount applied to the invoice, if any.  If DiscountPercent is provided, DiscountAmount is ignored.

Members.Name: terms
Members.Description: General terms for the invoice.

Members.Name: note
Members.Description: Note to the payer company.

Members.Name: merchantMemo
Members.Description: Memo for book keeping that is private to the Merchant.

Members.Name: shippingAmount
Members.Description: Cost of shipping.

Members.Name: shippingTaxName
Members.Description: Name of the applicable tax on shipping cost, if any.

Members.Name: shippingTaxRate
Members.Description: Rate of the applicable tax on shipping cost, if any.

Members.Name: logoUrl
Members.Description: The external image URL of the invoice's logo, if any

Members.Name: referrerCode
Members.Description: BN code for tracking transactions with a particular partner.

Members.Name: customAmountLabel
Members.Description:
Label used to display custom amount value.
                                If a value is entered for customAmountLabel, then customAmountValue cannot be empty.

Members.Name: customAmountValue
Members.Description:
Value of custom amount.
                                If a value is entered for customAmountValue, then customAmountLabel cannot be empty.

Members.Name: merchantInfo
Members.Description: Company contact information of the merchant company sending the invoice.

Members.Name: firstName
Members.Description: First name of the company contact.

Members.Name: lastName
Members.Description: Last name of the company contact.

Members.Name: businessName
Members.Description: Business name of the company.

Members.Name: phone
Members.Description: Phone number for contacting the company.

Members.Name: fax
Members.Description: Fax number used by the company.

Members.Name: website
Members.Description: Website used by the company.

Members.Name: customValue
Members.Description: Custom value to be displayed in the contact information details.

Members.Name: address
Members.Description: Street address of the company.

Members.Description: Billing information for the payer.

Members.Name: invoiceID
Members.Description: invoice's ID

Members.Name: subject
Members.Description: Subject of the cancellation notification

Members.Name: noteForPayer
Members.Description: Note to send payer within the cancellation notification

Members.Name: sendCopyToMerchant
Members.Description: send a copy of cancellation notification to merchant

Members.Name: merchantEmail
Members.Description: Invoice creator's email.

Members.Name: page
Members.Description: Page number of result set, starting with 1.

Members.Name: pageSize
Members.Description: Number of results per page, between 1 and 100.

Members.Name: errorLanguage
Members.Description:
This should be the standard RFC 3066
								language identification tag, e.g.,
								en_US.

Members.Name: detailLevel
Members.Description:
This specifies the required detail level
								that is needed by a client application
								pertaining to a particular data
								component (e.g., Item, Transaction,
								etc.). The detail level is specified in
								the DetailLevelCodeType which has all
								the enumerated values of the detail
								level for each component.

Members.Name: parameters
Members.Description: Parameters constraining the search.

Members.Name: email
Members.Description: Email search string.

Members.Name: recipientName
Members.Description: Recipient search string.

Members.Name: businessName
Members.Description: Company search string.

Members.Name: invoiceNumber
Members.Description: Invoice number search string.

Members.Name: status
Members.Description: Invoice status search.

Members.Name: lowerAmount
Members.Description: Invoice amount search.  Specifies the smallest amount to be returned.

Members.Name: upperAmount
Members.Description: Invoice amount search.  Specifies the largest amount to be returned.

Members.Name: currencyCode
Members.Description: Currency used for lower and upper amounts.  Required when lowerAmount or upperAmount is specified.

Members.Name: memo
Members.Description: Invoice memo search string.

Members.Name: origin
Members.Description: Whether the invoice was created via the website or via an API call.

Members.Name: invoiceDate
Members.Description: Invoice date range filter.

Members.Name: startDate
Members.Description: Start of the date range.

Members.Name: endDate
Members.Description: End of the date range.

Members.Name: dueDate
Members.Description: Invoice due date range filter.

Members.Name: startDate
Members.Description: Start of the date range.

Members.Name: endDate
Members.Description: End of the date range.

Members.Name: paymentDate
Members.Description: Invoice payment date range filter.

Members.Name: startDate
Members.Description: Start of the date range.

Members.Name: endDate
Members.Description: End of the date range.

Members.Name: creationDate
Members.Description: Invoice creation date range filter.

Members.Name: startDate
Members.Description: Start of the date range.

Members.Name: endDate
Members.Description: End of the date range.

Members.Name: invoiceID
Members.Description: ID of the invoice to mark as paid.

Members.Name: errorLanguage
Members.Description:
This should be the standard RFC 3066
								language identification tag, e.g.,
								en_US.

Members.Name: detailLevel
Members.Description:
This specifies the required detail level
								that is needed by a client application
								pertaining to a particular data
								component (e.g., Item, Transaction,
								etc.). The detail level is specified in
								the DetailLevelCodeType which has all
								the enumerated values of the detail
								level for each component.

Members.Name: payment
Members.Description: Details of the payment made against this invoice.

Members.Name: date
Members.Description: Date when the invoice was paid.

Members.Name: method
Members.Description: Method used for the offline payment.

Members.Name: note
Members.Description: Optional note associated with the payment.

Members.Name: invoiceID
Members.Description: ID of the invoice to mark as unpaid.

Members.Name: errorLanguage
Members.Description:
This should be the standard RFC 3066
								language identification tag, e.g.,
								en_US.

Members.Name: detailLevel
Members.Description:
This specifies the required detail level
								that is needed by a client application
								pertaining to a particular data

								etc.). The detail level is specified in
								the DetailLevelCodeType which has all

								level for each component.

Members.Name: invoiceID
Members.Description: ID of the invoice to mark as refunded.

Members.Name: errorLanguage
Members.Description:
This should be the standard RFC 3066
								language identification tag, e.g.,
								en_US.

Members.Name: detailLevel
Members.Description:
This specifies the required detail level
								that is needed by a client application
								pertaining to a particular data
								component (e.g., Item, Transaction,
								etc.). The detail level is specified in
								the DetailLevelCodeType which has all
								the enumerated values of the detail
								level for each component.

Members.Name: refundDetail
Members.Description: Details of the refund made against this invoice.

Members.Name: note
Members.Description: Optional note associated with the refund.

Members.Name: date
Members.Description:
Date when the invoice was marked as refunded. If the date is not specified, the current date and time is used as a default.
                                In addition, the date must be after the payment date of the invoice.
